allow: Bash(-e 's/style=""background: var(--card-bg); border: 1px solid var(--border); border-radius: var(--radius); padding: 1\.5rem; position: relative;""/class=""bg-card-bg border border-border rounded p-6 relative""/g' )
Bash(-e 's/style=""display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; margin-bottom: 1rem;""/class=""flex items-center justify-between mb-4""/g' )
Bash(-e 's/style=""display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 1rem;""/class=""flex items-center gap-4""/g' )

Bash(-e 's/style=""width: 40px; height: 40px; background: var(--primary); border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 1\.25rem; color: white;""/class=""w-10 h-10 bg-primary rounded-full flex items-center justify-center text-xl text-white""/g' )

Bash(-e 's/style=""background: var(--success); color: white; padding: 0\.25rem 0\.5rem; border-radius: 12px; font-size: 0\.75rem; font-weight: 600;""/class=""bg-success text-white px-2 py-1 rounded-xl text-xs font-semibold""/g' )

Bash(-e 's/style=""background: var(--warning); color: white; padding: 0\.25rem 0\.5rem; border-radius: 12px; font-size: 0\.75rem; font-weight: 600;""/class=""bg-warning text-white px-2 py-1 rounded-xl text-xs font-semibold""/g' )

Bash(-e 's/style=""background: var(--secondary); color: var(--text); padding: 0\.25rem 0\.5rem; border-radius: 12px; font-size: 0\.75rem; font-weight: 600;""/class=""bg-section-bg text-text-primary px-2 py-1 rounded-xl text-xs font-semibold""/g' )

Bash(-e 's/style=""display: flex; gap: 0\.5rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;""/class=""flex gap-2 mb-4""/g' )

Bash(-e 's/style=""background: var(--secondary); color: var(--text); padding: 0\.25rem 0\.5rem; border-radius: 12px; font-size: 0\.75rem;""/class=""bg-section-bg text-text-primary px-2 py-1 rounded-xl text-xs""/g' )
Bash(-e 's/style=""font-size: 1\.5rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; color: var(--text);""/class=""text-2xl mb-4 text-text-primary""/g' )

Bash(-e 's/style=""background: var(--primary); border: none; color: white; font-size: 1rem; cursor: pointer; padding: 0\.5rem; border-radius: 4px; width: 32px; height: 32px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center;""/class=""bg-primary border-0 text-white text-base cursor-pointer p-2 rounded w-8 h-8 flex items-center justify-center""/g' )

Bash(-e 's/style=""position: absolute; top: 100%; right: 0; background: var(--card-bg); border: 1px solid var(--border); border-radius: var(--radius); box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg); min-width: 140px; z-index: 1000; display: none;""/class=""absolute top-full right-0 bg-card-bg border border-border rounded shadow-lg min-w-[140px] z-[1000] hidden""/g' )

Bash(-e 's/style=""padding: 0\.5rem 0\.75rem; cursor: pointer; border-radius: 4px; font-size: 0\.875rem; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 0\.5rem;""/class=""px-3 py-2 cursor-pointer rounded text-sm flex items-center gap-2""/g' )

Bash(-e 's/class=""px-3 py-2 cursor-pointer rounded text-sm flex items-center gap-2"" class=""hover:bg-section-bg ""/class=""px-3 py-2 cursor-pointer rounded text-sm flex items-center gap-2 hover:bg-section-bg""/g' )
